title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 459.12 - Unsafe or hazardous conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 459.12 - Unsafe or hazardous conditions

State Regulations

In the event of special situations such as storms, cable
breaks, accidents, or other cases involving emergency maintenance and unsafe or
hazardous conditions, electric service may be temporarily terminated without
prior notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
459.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
